meanings.definition: A large aquatic salamander found in eastern North America.
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a tank full of hellbenders for visitors to see.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of hellbenders in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: When the hellbenders escaped from the aquarium, chaos ensued!
meanings.sent4: The river was teeming with hellbenders, like prehistoric creatures come to life.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the hellbenders swimming in the pond.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that causes extreme discomfort or distress.
meanings.sent1: The dentist's drill was a real hellbender for the patient.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise from the construction site was a real hellbender for the residents.
meanings.sent3: Trying to assemble the furniture without instructions was a real hellbender!
meanings.sent4: The unexpected rainstorm was a hellbender, ruining the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The long wait at the airport was a true hellbender for the tired travelers.
